about.vision: To become the first exclusive motorcycle riding community that offers the best deals with no membership fee, while promoting genuine brotherhood and camaraderie across the Philippines.
about.aboutUs: ADV Juansiksty Nation is more than a riding groupâ€”itâ€™s a family. We unite ADV 160 owners from all over the Philippines, guided by respect, service, integrity, and teamwork. With our members and partners, we build not just rides, but lasting friendships and shared experiences.
about.history:
Founded in October 2022 and headed by Kap Arki (John Arnie Bonete), ADV Juansiksty Nation Roundtable was built on the foundation of its Core Valuesâ€”manners, service, integrity, and teamwork. From the start, the vision was to create a safe and genuine community for motorcycle enthusiasts, free from toxicity, spam, and negativity.

Exclusively uniting proud owners of the Honda ADV 160 scooter, the group quickly grew from casual rides into a national brotherhood. More than just a riding club, it became a true home where camaraderie thrives, experiences are shared, and support is always presentâ€”on and off the road.

Today, under Kap Arkiâ€™s leadership, ADV Juansiksty Nation Roundtable continues its journey across the open roadâ€”guided by passion, strengthened by values, and bonded by the spirit of family.

timeline.title: Founded
timeline.description: Roundtable established in October 2022 under Kap Arki, grounded on core values and safe community principles.

timeline.title: Nationwide Rides
timeline.description: Chapters organized rides and outreach from Luzon to Mindanao; the community steadily grew.

timeline.title: Partners & Programs
timeline.description: Formalized partnerships and safety programs to support members on and off the road.

timeline.title: Expansion
timeline.description: Strengthened core groups and expanded activities across regions, keeping membership free.
